name: #SRNT - AI Crisis Aide
description:
Project Serenity - (#SRNT) is a platform to provide information about the nearest help for people in difficult life situations.

We collect, verify, systematize and provide open access to the data collected in the framework of the project.

Using artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies, we in the #SRNT project build predictive models for effective interaction with victims.

Project #SRNT generates independent incident reports detailing where and when help is requested. Guided by SoftPower and OpenData, #SRNT publishes publicly available analytics and sends reports to government and public organizations interested in the information.

The #SRNT project is completely free!

sdgs.relevance:
SDG5 - Project #SRNT provides equal access to information about help in crisis situations. Since women, children and LGBTQ+ groups are particularly at risk, the project primarily targets these groups.
SDG9 - Project #SRNT uses the latest developments in AI, ML, BigData. As supporters of OpenData we not only collect and work with information but also provide the public free access to it.
SDG16 - Guided by the SoftPower principle, the #SRNT project publishes and sends the collected data to government and public organizations, thus gently influencing the work of relevant organizations and public opinion.
The problem of an individual person must be interpreted as a general problem of society.
